name: Glorp's Nightmares
description:
Help!! Glorp is really tired, and he feels like he's gonna have really BAD DREAMS! Help Glorp defeat his nightmares by building his home defenses before he goes to sleep. Waves of enemies are coming! Can you survive these ten tough nights? Good luck, and have fun!

------

"Glorp's Nightmares" is a tactical, top-down shooter where you play as Glorp-a-dorp (or simply Glorp). You place defenses during the day, and fend off waves of enemies during the night. It's a short game, with a total of 10 levels. You finish each level by surviving for a certain amount of time. Think you got the brains and guts to complete 'em?

"Glorp thinks this is a very good game." - Glorp

"Glorp wants to go to sleep now." - Glorp

This game is a submission for the "Godot Wild Jam 55"  game jam.
